msbt.message: I want you to have this as a thanks for making me...me! Now you're a step closer to being as cool and cracklin' as I am! How chill is that? Thanks again!
Thanks for making me look so cool! I'll give you this item to say thanks, and I'm hoping it'll make you as chill and ice-cool as me!
I'm really happy I met you this winter! I'll give you this frosty-cool item as a thank-you for exercising your pro-level, snow-rolling skills. I hope you're the one who makes me next time too!
You really gotta let me thank you! Sure, I'll melt away someday, but this is a special item for a special time, and it won't blink in the heat of summer. You can hold onto it for a very long time!
I've got nothing but gratitude for you, friend. You made me so well, I'm dripping with coolness. I'm so cool, I feel like my chill memory will stick around even after I've melted away.
As a special treat for making me, I'm gonna teach you how to make one cool item! But if you've never done a DIY project before, you should take the DIY workshop held in Resident Services.
